function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate data for estimating the effect size","Impact":"Misleading conclusions in the meta-analysis","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analyses and explore alternative effect size estimation methods","Technologies":"Data validation and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, meta-analysts, and decision-makers","Owner":"Research organizations, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Majority of studies from a limited number of countries (US and China)","Impact":"Lack of global representation in the study results","Mitigation":"Encourage and support research in underrepresented regions and countries","Technologies":"Collaborative research networks, international research funding","People":"Global health organizations, funding agencies, researchers","Owner":"Global health organizations, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Observational quasi-experimental study designs","Impact":"Potential for confounding and bias in the study results","Mitigation":"Use robust statistical methods to adjust for confounding factors, consider alternative study designs","Technologies":"Statistical software, study design optimization tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and study designers","Owner":"Research organizations, academic institutions"}]}
